detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#5)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#9)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#69-71)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#15)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#44-55)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#73-77)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#28)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#33)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#79-81)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Token.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20Token__21.sol#92-95)
